attributes.action: Ban forthwith all police patrol chases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The IPCC has published a study of "Police Road Traffic Incidents" and in 2001/02 52 deaths occurred,02/03,38 deaths,04/05 45 deaths and 47deaths in05/06...to march this year 23 deaths have occurred.It makes no mention of the underlying misery of family or relatives and friends.We believe there is no place for police persuits on Britains already overcrowded roads and this barbaric and crude institutionalised practice must cease forthwith and foot patrols be re-introduced as the police are completely invisible in the community.
